custom-block.s: $brush switch on %n %n to red %n green %n blue %n

scripts.comment: 1. Click on the green flag to start the project and get your nickname
2. Trigger the example loops. Both are different.
3. Now you can create your own animations with these spare blocks
WARNING: This is the internal code running on the frontage, you should not make any change in this sprite, you could break your project! If you're lost, click on the "Example" sprite instead.

block.comment: This thread initializes and then refreshes the full matrix at a specific rate
This thread regularly updates the simulated/live status

scripts.comment: Welcom to the Snake game! Click the initial block to start and use directional arrows to move.

custom-block.s: $brush switch on %n %n to red %n green %n blue %n

scripts.comment: Some improvement ideas: - Drop some apples on the board - The Snake grows when it eats an apple
Our current version is too simple. Can you improve it?

custom-block.s: $brush switch on %n %n to red %n green %n blue %n

block-definition.s: $brush switch on %'row' %'column' to red %'red' green %'green' blue %'blue'
set pen color to r: %'r' g: %'g' b: %'b'

custom-block.s: set pen color to r: %n g: %n b: %n

block.l: var httpRequest = new XMLHttpRequest(); httpRequest.open('POST', url, true); httpRequest.send(data || null); return true;

var response; if (!proc.httpRequest) { proc.httpRequest = new XMLHttpRequest(); proc.httpRequest.open('GET', url, true); proc.httpRequest.send(null); } else if (proc.httpRequest.readyState === 4) { response = proc.httpRequest.responseText; proc.httpRequest = null; return response; } proc.pushContext('doYield'); proc.pushContext();

custom-block.s: set pen color to r: %n g: %n b: %n
set pen color to r: %n g: %n b: %n
$brush switch on %n %n to red %n green %n blue %n

block-definition.comment: LABEL will stamp text on the stage at the given font size. The direction of the text is the direction the sprite is facing, and color will match the pen color.

block.l: var stage = this.parentThatIsA(StageMorph), context = stage.penTrails().getContext('2d'), rotation = radians(this.direction() - 90), trans = new Point( this.center().x - stage.left(), this.center().y - stage.top() ), isWarped = this.Warped, len, pos; if (isWarped) {endWarp(); } context.save(); context.font = size + 'px monospace'; context.textAlign = 'left'; context.textBaseline = 'alphabetic'; context.fillStyle = this.color.toString(); len = context.measureText(text).width; trans = trans.multiplyBy(1 / stage.scale); context.translate(trans.x, trans.y); context.rotate(rotation); context.fillText(text, 0, 0); context.translate(-trans.x, -trans.y); context.restore(); pos = new Point( len * Math.sin(radians(this.direction())), len * Math.cos(radians(this.direction()))); pos = pos.add(new Point(this.xPosition(), this.yPosition())); this.gotoXY(pos.x, pos.y, false); this.changed(); if (isWarped) {this.startWarp(); } stage.changed();

custom-block.s: set pen color to r: %n g: %n b: %n
